body_html:
Can you give a self-contained example to reproduce? I cannot reproduce at 0e1efc3 with the following:

#include "tensorflow/core/public/session.h"
#include "tensorflow/cc/ops/standard_ops.h"

int main() {
  using namespace tensorflow;
  using namespace tensorflow::ops;
  GraphDef graph_def;
  {
    Scope root = Scope::NewRootScope().WithDevice("/gpu:0");
    auto A = Const(root, 1.0f);
    Graph* graph = root.graph();
    graph->ToGraphDef(&graph_def);
  }
  SessionOptions options;
  options.config.set_allow_soft_placement(true);
  Session* sess = NewSession(options);
  Status status = sess->Create(graph_def);
  LOG(INFO) << status;
}
